metadata.title: CVE-2019-16319 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In Wireshark 3.0.0 to 3.0.3 and 2.6.0 to 2.6.10, the Gryphon dissectorcould go into an infinite loop. This was addressed inplugins/epan/gryphon/packet-gryphon.c by checking for a message length ofzero.

criterions.comment: wireshark: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
